name: Yumpy! An Expired Yogurt's Last Hope
name_original: Yumpy! An Expired Yogurt's Last Hope
description:
You are Yumpy! 'Mom' is gone for fifteen minutes, you have to convince a little girl named Hope to eat you before Mom comes back.

If 'escape' doesn't work, you can pause the game using the 'P' key.

This is my first videogame, and I'm spanish so it probably will be a bunch of mistakes in the game. It's been made for an academic Jam within a seven-day deadline. I'll take any comment with pleasure. Thanks for playing!
